00017 #define DEV_FILE "/dev/vmedrv" // default access mode 0x09 - A32, data D32
00018 
00019 int mvme_open(MVME_INTERFACE **vme, int idx)
00020 {
00021         *vme = (MVME_INTERFACE *) malloc(sizeof(MVME_INTERFACE));
00022         if (*vme == NULL)
00023                 return MVME_NO_MEM;
00024         memset(*vme, 0, sizeof(MVME_INTERFACE));
00025 
00026         int fd;
00027         if ((fd = open(DEV_FILE, O_RDWR))<0)
00028         {
00029                 perror("ERROR: fd open()");
00030                 exit(EXIT_FAILURE);
00031         }
00032 
00033         (*vme)->handle = fd;
00034         (*vme)->am = MVME_AM_A32_ND;
00035         (*vme)->dmode = MVME_DMODE_D32;
00036         (*vme)->initialized = 1;
00037         bt617_SetAccessMode(*vme);
00038 
00039         (*vme)->blt_mode = MVME_BLT_NONE;
00040         (*vme)->table = NULL;
00041 
00042         return MVME_SUCCESS;
00043 }
00044 
00045 int mvme_close(MVME_INTERFACE *vme)
00046 {
00047         close(vme->handle);
00048         return MVME_SUCCESS;
00049 }

00051 void show_mvme(MVME_INTERFACE *vme)
00052 {
00053         printf("mvme properties:\n");
00054         printf("init: %d\n",vme->initialized);
00055         printf("handl: %d\n",vme->handle);
00056         printf("index: %d\n",vme->index);
00057         printf("am: %X\n",vme->am);
00058         printf("dw: %d\n",vme->dmode);
00059 }

00061 vmedrv_access_mode_t bt617_GetAccessMode(MVME_INTERFACE *vme)
00062 {
00063         int dmode = vme->dmode;
00064         int am = vme->am;
00065         int enum_am, enum_dm;
00066         switch (am)
00067         {
00068                 case MVME_AM_A32_ND:
00069                         enum_am = 0;
00070                         break;
00071                 case MVME_AM_A24_ND:
00072                         enum_am = 1;
00073                         break;
00074                 case MVME_AM_A16_ND:
00075                         enum_am = 2;
00076                         break;
00077                 default:
00078                         enum_am = 0;
00079                         break;
00080         }
00081 
00082         switch (dmode)
00083         {
00084                 case MVME_DMODE_D32:
00085                         enum_dm = 0;
00086                         break;
00087                 case MVME_DMODE_D16:
00088                         enum_dm = 1;
00089                         break;
00090                 default:
00091                         enum_dm = 0;
00092                         break;
00093         }
00094 
00095         static vmedrv_access_mode_t access_mode_tab[3][2] = {
00096                 {VMEDRV_A32D32,VMEDRV_A32D16},
00097                 {VMEDRV_A24D32,VMEDRV_A24D16},
00098                 {VMEDRV_A16D32,VMEDRV_A16D16}
00099         };
00100         return access_mode_tab[enum_am][enum_dm];
00101 }
00102 
00103 void bt617_SetAccessMode(MVME_INTERFACE *vme)
00104 {
00105         vmedrv_access_mode_t amode = bt617_GetAccessMode(vme);
00106         ioctl(vme->handle,VMEDRV_IOC_SET_ACCESS_MODE,&amode);
00107 }

00129 int mvme_set_blt(MVME_INTERFACE *vme, int mode)
00130 {
00131         vme->blt_mode = mode;
00132         if (mode == MVME_BLT_NONE)
00133         {
00134                 bt617_SetBLT(vme, false);
00135         }
00136         else
00137         {
00138                 bt617_SetBLT(vme, true);
00139         }
00140         return 0;
00141 }

00155 int mvme_read(MVME_INTERFACE *vme, void *dst, 
00156                 mvme_addr_t vme_addr, mvme_size_t n_bytes)
00157 {
00158         int read_size;
00159         if(lseek(vme->handle,vme_addr,SEEK_SET) == -1)
00160         {
00161                 printf("lseek err\n");
00162                 return -1;
00163         }
00164         read_size = read(vme->handle,dst,n_bytes);
00165 
00166         if (read_size < 0)
00167         {
00168                 printf("read err\n");
00169                 return -1;
00170         }
00171         else 
00172                 return read_size;
00173 }

00175 int mvme_write(MVME_INTERFACE *vme, mvme_addr_t vme_addr, void *src, mvme_size_t n_bytes)
00176 {
00177         int write_size;
00178         if(lseek(vme->handle,vme_addr,SEEK_SET) == -1)
00179         {
00180                 printf("lseek err\n");
00181                 return -1;
00182         }
00183         write_size = write(vme->handle,src,n_bytes);
00184         if (write_size < 0)
00185         {
00186                 printf("write err\n");
00187                 return -1;
00188         }
00189         else 
00190                 return write_size;
00191 }

00193 unsigned int mvme_read_value(MVME_INTERFACE *vme, mvme_addr_t vme_addr)
00194 {
00195         int read_size,nbytes;
00196         unsigned int value;
00197         switch (vme->dmode)
00198         {
00199                 case MVME_DMODE_D32:
00200                         nbytes = 4;
00201                         break;
00202                 case MVME_DMODE_D16:
00203                         nbytes = 2;
00204                         break;
00205                 default:
00206                         nbytes = 4;
00207                         break;
00208         }
00209         read_size = mvme_read(vme,&value,vme_addr,nbytes);
00210         return value;
00211 }
00212 
00213 int mvme_write_value(MVME_INTERFACE *vme, mvme_addr_t vme_addr, unsigned int value)
00214 {
00215         int write_size,nbytes;
00216         switch (vme->dmode)
00217         {
00218                 case MVME_DMODE_D32:
00219                         nbytes = 4;
00220                         break;
00221                 case MVME_DMODE_D16:
00222                         nbytes = 2;
00223                         break;
00224                 default:
00225                         nbytes = 4;
00226                         break;
00227         }
00228         write_size = mvme_write(vme,vme_addr,&value,nbytes);
00229         if (write_size < 0)
00230         {
00231                 printf("write_value err \n");
00232                 return -1;
00233         }
00234         else 
00235                 return 0;
00236 }

00238 void showbits(uint32_t data)
00239 {
00240  int ii;
00241     for (ii=31;ii>=28;ii--)
00242         (data&(1<<ii))?putchar('1'):putchar('0');
00243     putchar(' ');
00244 
00245     for (ii=27;ii>=24;ii--) 
00246         (data&(1<<ii))?putchar('1'):putchar('0');
00247     putchar(' ');
00248 
00249     for (ii=23;ii>=20;ii--) 
00250         (data&(1<<ii))?putchar('1'):putchar('0');
00251     putchar(' ');
00252 
00253     for (ii=19;ii>=16;ii--) 
00254         (data&(1<<ii))?putchar('1'):putchar('0');
00255     putchar(' ');
00256 
00257     for (ii=15;ii>=12;ii--) 
00258         (data&(1<<ii))?putchar('1'):putchar('0');
00259     putchar(' ');
00260 
00261     for (ii=11;ii>=8;ii--) 
00262         (data&(1<<ii))?putchar('1'):putchar('0');
00263     putchar(' ');
00264 
00265     for (ii=7;ii>=4;ii--) 
00266         (data&(1<<ii))?putchar('1'):putchar('0');
00267     putchar(' ');
00268 
00269     for (ii=3;ii>=0;ii--) 
00270         (data&(1<<ii))?putchar('1'):putchar('0');
00271     putchar('\n');
00272 }
00273 
00274 void bt617_SetBLT(MVME_INTERFACE *vme, bool blt)
00275 {
00276         if (blt)
00277         {
00278                 int transfer_method = VMEDRV_DMA;
00279                 ioctl(vme->handle, VMEDRV_IOC_SET_TRANSFER_METHOD, &transfer_method);
00280         }
00281         else
00282         {
00283                 int transfer_method = VMEDRV_PIO;
00284                 ioctl(vme->handle, VMEDRV_IOC_SET_TRANSFER_METHOD, &transfer_method);
00285 
00286         }
00287 }

00289 #ifdef TEST_INTERFACE
00290 #define V1290N_BASE 0x0040000
00291 #define RPV130_BASE 0x8000
00292 #include "rpv130.h"
00293 
00294 int main()
00295 {
00296         printf("Main: \n");
00297         MVME_INTERFACE *myvme;
00298         mvme_open(&myvme, 0);
00299         //show_mvme(myvme);
00300 
00301         // RPV130, A16 only
00302         myvme->am = MVME_AM_A16_ND;
00303         myvme->dmode = MVME_DMODE_D16;
00304         bt617_SetAccessMode(myvme);
00305         //show_mvme(myvme);
00306         unsigned short int reg;
00307         reg = mvme_read_value(myvme,RPV130_CSR_1 + RPV130_BASE);
00308         printf("CSR1: %X \n",reg);
00309 
00310         reg = 0x3;
00311         mvme_write_value(myvme,RPV130_BASE + RPV130_CSR_1,0x3); // reset busy flag
00312         reg = mvme_read_value(myvme,RPV130_CSR_1 + RPV130_BASE);
00313         printf("CSR1: %X \n",reg);
00314 
00315         sleep(1);
00316         mvme_write_value(myvme, RPV130_BASE + RPV130_PULSE,0x1); // pulse to set busy
00317         reg = mvme_read_value(myvme,RPV130_CSR_1 + RPV130_BASE);
00318         printf("CSR1: %X \n",reg);
00319 
00320         // Finish
00321         mvme_close(myvme);
00322         return 0;
00323 }
00324 #endif
